name: GACHIMUCHI Arcade: Lustful Boys ♂
description:
GACHIMUCHI Arcade: Lustful Boys is a collection of various games that allows the player to learn all the secrets of true male friendship and learn special techniques of wrestling.
♂ Features ♂
  • 30 H♂T LEVELS for honing your skills
  • Five different game modes:
  1. Snake - control your Dungeon Master in the hunt for Slaves и Naked Asses

  2. Pong - Fight in a fierce battle with Artifical Intelligence and tell him that the robot club's is two blocks down

  3. Arkanoid - Break rectangular blocks and make them your Slaves

  4. Puzzle - A special mode that allows you to collect in parts the images of the greatest Dungeon mASSters

  5. Xonix - Cum through your way to great knowledge without letting Slaves touch you.

  • Relaxing Ass Slaps and Gachi-Music will let you to immerse yourself in the atmosphere of the game
  • 69 Achievments
  • Gallery, where you can see all the images in full size and replenish your knowledge
  • Super-Zoom for a detailed study of the content presented in the game

♂ Come play and show these slaves who's the real boss of this gym! ♂
